name: A Woman Like Me
content: And i really don't believe in love
Sometimes i'm just out of control
You need to stop for a minute
Before you get too deep up in it
Cause everything aint what it seems
Cause baby i'm one step ahead
I aint trying to lead you on
You need to stop for a minute
Before you get too deep up in it
Cause everything aint what it seems
You need to stop for a minute
Before you get too deep up in it
Cause everything aint what it seems
